author: Flo (tonebytone)
content:
I do like the end result of this app. I think, when you have more time that is, lol, you can get the same effect in Photoshop. Edge Detect at least twice, plus perhaps Ink Outlines (I think that's the name of the filter).

Moving is never fun. Packing up, transporting, and then unpacking and arranging. I've lived in my house for 50 years this fall - and it looks it. I do not edit myself very well.  I wouldn't be able to move unless and until I address the issue of way too much stuff!
